SELECT B.B_NO, M.M_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_TYPE, B.B_DATE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.B_RENAMED_FILENAME, B.B_VIEW, B.B_STATUS, B.B_ANSWER_STATUS, B.BCATEGORY, M.M_ID, C.CM_NO AS "CM_CM_NO", C.B_NO AS "CM_B_NO", C.CM_CONTENT AS "CM_CM_CONTENT", C.CM_WRITER_ID AS "CM_CM_WRITER_ID", C.CM_WRITER_NO AS "CM_CM_WRITER_NO", C.CM_DATE AS "CM_CM_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.M_NO = M.M_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT NUM, CM_NO, B_NO, CM_CONTENT, CM_WRITER_ID, CM_WRITER_NO, CM_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS "NUM", CM_NO, B_NO, CM_CONTENT, CM_WRITER_ID, CM_WRITER_NO, CM_DATE FROM COMMENTS WHERE CM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CM_DATE ) ) C ON(B.B_NO = C.B_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(C.CM_WRITER_NO = M2.M_NO) WHERE B.B_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.B_NO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_STATUS = #{bstatus} WHERE B_NO = #{bno}
